Package it.polimi.ingsw.network.client

Class ClientSender

java.lang.Object
it.polimi.ingsw.network.client.ClientSender
public class ClientSender extends Object
This class is only tasked to send messages to the server, it doesn't check their respective answers, which will be left to the Receiver This class doesn't deal with the ping routine

      public ClientSender(InitialConnector initialConnector)

  • Method Details

    • initialize

      public void initialize(OutputStream outputStream, MessageBroker mainBroker, AtomicBoolean connected, AtomicBoolean isCommandScheduled)
      Initializes the sender of messages
      Parameters:
      outputStream - the stream on which to send messages
      mainBroker - the message broker that will be used to send the messages to the server
      connected - a boolean shared with the initialConnector and the sender to notify each other of a network problem
      isCommandScheduled - a lock-like atomic boolean used to avoid congesting the queue, also accessed by the receiver

    • reset

      public void reset()
      Resets the flags for the receiver and puts it in a state ready to start a new connection with the server

    • sendNickname

      public boolean sendNickname(String nickname)
      Sends the chosen nickname to the server to evaluate whether it's acceptable or not
      Parameters:
      nickname - the nickname chosen by the user
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • sendGameModePreference

      public boolean sendGameModePreference(int gamemode, int numPlayers)
      Sends the gamerule preferences to the server
      Parameters:
      gamemode - the gamemode chosen, "1" for Simple, "2" for Advanced
      numPlayers - the number of players chosen
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • sendReadyStatus

      public boolean sendReadyStatus(boolean ready)
      Updates the server on the readiness of the user
      Parameters:
      ready - true if the client is signaling that they're ready
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • startGame

      public boolean startGame()
      Tries to start the game from the lobby
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • leaveLobby

      public boolean leaveLobby()
      The user asks to leave the current lobby
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • sendTeamColorChoice

      public boolean sendTeamColorChoice(TeamEnum colorChosen)
      Sends the color preference for the game
      Parameters:
      colorChosen - the color (white, grey or black, depending on the game mode) the user chooses
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • sendWizardChoice

      public boolean sendWizardChoice(WizardEnum wizardChosen)
      Sends the wizard chosen for this game
      Parameters:
      wizardChosen - the wizard, among the 4 available, chosen by the user
      Returns:
      true if the message was successfully sent, false if nothing was sent to the server

    • sendToServer

      private boolean sendToServer()
      This method, using the output stream of the server, adds the request ID and tries to send the message that was previously constructed in the appropriate methods

      private int addIdRequest()

      Returns:
      the id that's just been added

      private boolean acquireSendingRights()
      Tries to acquire sending rights by checking the atomic boolean.
      Returns:
      true if the boolean was successfully set, false otherwise
